feed.title: Algonquin Park (Lake of Two Rivers) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Algonquin Park (Lake of Two Rivers)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:18 p.m. EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 12.4Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 5:00 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
Temperature: 12.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 11.5°C
Wind: S 9 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early this evening then cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
